titles.title: Northern Spotted Owl Habitat Improvement Act of 2021
Northern Spotted Owl Habitat Improvement Act of 2021
To codify certain regulations issued by the United States Fish and Wildlife Service relating to critical habitat for the Northern Spotted Owl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

bill.summary:
Northern Spotted Owl Habitat Improvement Act of 2021
The bill provides statutory authority for the rule published on January 15, 2021, by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service entitled Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Revised Designation of Critical Habitat for the Northern Spotted Owl.
